ComicInfo.Summary: Throughout the unending vastness of the multiverse echo the cries of the monster inside mister Bruce Banner… the unstoppable force known as the Hulk. Join us as we continue our quest to chronicle the catalogue of crosstime Hulk, asking not “What If…” but “What is?” This ALL-NEW oversized special revisits the worlds of the Age of Apocalypse, the Days of Future Past, the Marvel Mangaverse, and the year 1602!
ComicInfo.Title: Out of Time; Son of the Dragon; A Norse of a Different Color; Post-Apocalypse
ComicInfo.Writer: Adam Warren,Jason Henderson,Marc Sumerak,Jason Henderson,Marc Sumerak,Adam Warren
